Articles.Content:
hello kerbalnauts,

can someone recommend some mods to make computer faster? with the new thermal system, my computer slow as hell during reentry, and sometimes just quit when there're too many parts, I guess RAM isn't enough?

Mods will usually slow you down. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)[ATM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-1-0-Release-5-0-April-28-2015-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM!) is the only one I know of that generally speeds you up.

Try lowering the Aerodynamic FX Quality slider in your settings, if it's just reentry that's causing the problem. Plus the usual video card driver updating thing.
